description: Speaking at the AI Impact Summit 2026, Justice Pratibha Singh said existing intellectual property frameworks, designed to reward human creativity, are now being challenged by the growth of artificial intelligence.

title: AI Sore Big Tech Cos' Artificial Splurge Eats Into Stock Buybacks
description: In a bold pivot towards the future, major tech giants are pulling back on stock buybacks to invest heavily in artificial intelligence.
